text: phir bhi agar ye aap se jhagde to aap kehde ke main aur mere tabedaaro ne Allah ta’ala ke saamne apna sare tasleem qam8 kar diya aur ahle kitaab se aur an-pad logo se keh dijiye! ke kya tum bhi ita’ath karte ho? pas agar ye bhi tabedaar ban jaaye to yaqinan hidaayath waale hai aur agar ye rugardaani9 kare to aap par sirf pahocha dena hai aur Allah bandho ko qoob dekh bhaal raha hai
